name: Momburo - Mauarí's Curse
description:
Mauarí cast a curse upon the Tapuia's tribe, unleashing a devastating drought. Only Master Burití can save them with the aid of his palm trees!

How to play:
- Select the chosen phase;

- Click on the desired piece to put on the board;

- Hover with the mouse with the piece previously selected to preview it;

- create a path connecting both ocas with the roots from the Burití.
